name: H Girl 2
description:
Introduction

H Girl 2 is a puzzle game. Players only need to swap the tiles to restore the picture. For players without patience, the game supports the cheat mode: one click to auto swap the puzzle. There is no time, score, or ranking limitation in the game. It is only for players' joy.

Features

  • 5 characters with 20 high resolution original images respectively
  • Jiggle physics for each image
  • Relaxing music
  • Undo/Redo swapping
  • Auto swap
  • Zoom In/Out
  • Historical gallery
  • 100 achievements

Jiggle Physics



Bonus
